statements: SELECT * FROM investment_analysis ORDER BY date DESC, close_price ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT symbol, date, open_price FROM investment_analysis WHERE volume > 100000 ORDER BY open_price DESC
SELECT symbol, date, close_price FROM investment_analysis WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT symbol, volume FROM investment_analysis WHERE close_price < 50 ORDER BY volume DESC
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM investment_analysis WHERE date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT * FROM investment_analysis WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' AND date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT symbol, open_price, close_price FROM investment_analysis WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT symbol, AVG(open_price) AS avg_open_price FROM investment_analysis GROUP BY symbol HAVING AVG(open_price) > 1000;
SELECT symbol, COUNT(*) AS num_records FROM investment_analysis GROUP BY symbol ORDER BY num_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM investment_analysis ORDER BY date DESC, close_price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 1000 ORDER BY stock_name DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_value FROM portfolio WHERE portfolio_value < 50000;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price, trade_date FROM stocks ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT portfolio_name, creation_date FROM portfolio ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM stocks WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 100 ORDER BY stock_price DESC;
SELECT stock_name, trade_date FROM stocks WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT portfolio_name, portfolio_value FROM portfolio WHERE portfolio_value < 50000 ORDER BY portfolio_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM stocks INNER JOIN portfolio ON stocks.stock_id = portfolio.portfolio_id;
SELECT * FROM stocks;
SELECT stock_name, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 100;
SELECT stock_name, stock_volume FROM stocks ORDER BY stock_volume DESC;
SELECT * FROM stock_prices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT portfolio_id, owner_name, total_value FROM portfolios WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT stock_id, stock_name, stock_price FROM stocks;
SELECT * FROM stocks ORDER BY stock_name DESC;
SELECT stock_name, AVG(stock_price) AS avg_price FROM stocks GROUP BY stock_name;
SELECT portfolio_id, owner_name, total_value FROM portfolios WHERE total_value > 100000 ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT p.portfolio_id, p.owner_name, SUM(sp.close_price) AS total_stock_value FROM portfolios p JOIN stock_prices sp ON p.portfolio_id = sp.stock_id GROUP BY p.portfolio_id, p.owner_name;
SELECT * FROM StockPrices WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date <= '2022-01-31'
SELECT symbol, open, close FROM StockPrices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT symbol, volume FROM StockPrices WHERE close > 100 ORDER BY volume DESC
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, created_date FROM Portfolios WHERE created_date < '2021-12-31'
SELECT investment_id, symbol, buy_price, quantity FROM Investments WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY buy_date ASC
SELECT symbol, date, open, close, volume FROM StockPrices WHERE symbol = 'AAPL';
SELECT * FROM StockPrices WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY close DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, created_date FROM Portfolios WHERE created_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_date ASC;
SELECT symbol, buy_date, buy_price, quantity FROM Investments WHERE portfolio_id = 123 ORDER BY buy_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_type, transaction_price, transaction_quantity FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' AND transaction_date <= '2022-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM stocks ORDER BY stock_price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_price FROM stocks WHERE stock_volume > 1000 AND trade_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY creation_date ASC;
SELECT investor_name, investor_email FROM investors ORDER BY investor_name;
SELECT transaction_date, quantity, transaction_price FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'BUY' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM stocks ORDER BY stock_price DESC, trade_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT stock_symbol, stock_price, trade_date FROM stocks WHERE stock_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT stocks.stock_symbol, stocks.stock_price, portfolios.portfolio_name FROM stocks INNER JOIN portfolios ON stocks.stock_id = portfolios.portfolio_id WHERE stocks.stock_price < 50
SELECT investor_name, investment_amount FROM investors WHERE investment_amount > 10000 ORDER BY investment_amount DESC

SELECT portfolios.portfolio_name, performance.performance_date, performance.portfolio_value FROM portfolios INNER JOIN performance ON portfolios.portfolio_id = performance.portfolio_id ORDER BY performance_date DESC
